document_data.mainbody:
eesa was Hagens daughter in Neverwinter in the 1370s DR.
Reesa was a merchant and Hagens daughter. Reesa would greet the Kalach-Cha if the Kalach-Cha sided with the Watch. Like her father, she thought the Watch was ineffective, but would gain a better impression of them. Before thieves came, Hagen dismissed her, as she could have been captured.
